recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER   re:  19     MOTION  to Dismiss Complaint. filed by   Ladas & Parry LLP,  32     MOTION  to Dismiss the Amended Complaint. filed by   Ladas & Parry LLP. Defendant's motion to dismiss the amended complaint is GRAN TED.  Counts I and II are dismissed with   prejudice.  Counts III and IV are dismissed without prejudice.  The Clerk is directed to close the motions at ECF Nos. 19 and 32, to lift the stay, to enter   judgment of dismissal, and to close the case.  SO ORDERED.   Case Stay Lifted.  (Signed by Judge J.
